# behavioralStyle

**Instance Property**

The behavioral style of the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var behavioralStyle: UIBehavioralStyle { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to determine the actual behavior style when the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar/preferredBehavioralStyle] is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBehavioralStyle/automatic].

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBehavioralStyle/mac], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbar] hosts the navigation bar’s content when you build your app with Mac Catalyst.

## Building with Mac Catalyst

- **preferredBehavioralStyle**: The preferred behavioral style of the navigation bar.
- **currentNSToolbarSection**: The toolbar section that the navigation bar is currently using.
- **UINavigationBar.NSToolbarSection**: Constants that determine how the system hosts the navigation bar in an AppKit toolbar.
